attributes.name: bullet-point
attributes.value: Gemini 2.0 has been made available for everyone, featuring new updates and introducing variants like Flash-Lite and Pro Experimental for enhanced functionality.

attributes.name: bullet-point
attributes.value: DeepMind is advancing adaptive AI with new frameworks aimed at stronger security and performance benchmarks, particularly in the realm of AGI and large language models.

attributes.name: bullet-point
attributes.value: Highlighting a year of AI breakthroughs, significant advancements are being made in fields from healthcare and climate change to robotics and music generation, showcasing the transformative impact of AI technology.
